entry.title: Ilmerge a .NET 4.5 Project
entry.content: When packaging a console exe for easy deployment on a client machine I wanted to run ilmerge.exe recently. I have found that all it takes is to reference the right framework assemblies in the /targetplatform command line switch. The full command on my machine then looks like: ps1 ilmerge for .NET 4.5 ilmerge /t:exe /targetplatform:"v4,$env:windir\Microsoft.NET\Framework64\v4.0.30319" /lib:. /out:outname.exe .\inname.exe [additional-library.dll, ...]
